description: monitoring of illegal (above 80dB) noise levels generated by traffic

options.content:
This dashboard monitors noise levels above 86dB. The choice of 86dB is based on personal sensitivity; it represents the threshold at which noise becomes intolerably disruptive for me.

Regulation in Belgium:

  • Heavy vehicles >150Kw = maximum 80dB
  • Motorcycles >175cm3 = maximum 80dB

For more information, please visit the Belgian health department's page on road vehicles.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "noise_buster_realtime_24h_retention")
  |> range(start: -1m)  // Ajustez cette plage selon vos besoins
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "noise_level")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r._field == "temperature")
  |> yield(name: "temperature")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r._field == "weather_description")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last_weather_description")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bike")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> yield(name: "bike_counts_since_midnight")

// Query to get the bike count
bike_counts = from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bike")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with vehicle_type: "Bike", _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

// Query to get the car count
car_counts = from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "car")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with vehicle_type: "Car", _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

// Query to get the heavy vehicle count
heavy_counts = from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "heavy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with vehicle_type: "Heavy", _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

// Combine the results
union(tables: [bike_counts, car_counts, heavy_counts])
  |> group(columns: ["vehicle_type"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, vehicle_type: r.vehicle_type}))
  |> yield(name: "vehicle_type_counts")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bike")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => {
      hour = int(v: time(v: r._time)) % 86400000000000 / 3600000000000
      return hour >= 1
  })
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> yield(name: "hourly_bike_counts_from_1am")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "car")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => {
      hour = int(v: time(v: r._time)) % 86400000000000 / 3600000000000
      return hour >= 1
  })
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> yield(name: "hourly_car_counts_from_1am")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "heavy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => {
      hour = int(v: time(v: r._time)) % 86400000000000 / 3600000000000
      return hour >= 1
  })
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> yield(name: "hourly_heavy_counts_from_1am")

panels.title: Type of vehicles for selected time range

targets.query:
from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "car_speed_70_30_40" or r["_field"] == "car_speed_70_40_50" or r["_field"] == "car_speed_70_50_60" or r["_field"] == "car_speed_70_60_70" or r["_field"] == "car_speed_70_70_plus")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: int(v: r._value),
      category: if r._field == "car_speed_70_30_40" then "30 -> 40 kmph"
                else if r._field == "car_speed_70_40_50" then "40 -> 50 kmph"
                else if r._field == "car_speed_70_50_60" then "50 -> 60 kmph"
                else if r._field == "car_speed_70_60_70" then "60 -> 70 kmph"
                else if r._field == "car_speed_70_70_plus" then "Above 70 kmph"
                else r._field
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["category"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: vehicles speed ranges in selected time range

targets.query:
from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "car")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> yield(name: "daily_car_counts")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "traffic_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "heavy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value) }))
  |> yield(name: "daily_heavy_counts")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r.location == "noise_buster")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r._field == "temperature")
  |> yield(name: "temperature")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r._field == "weather_description")
  |> yield(name: "weather_description")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r._field == "precipitation_float")
  |> yield(name: "precipitation")

panels.title: Real-time sound levels, temperatures, and precipitation for selected time range

targets.query:
from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "noise_buster_events" and r["_field"] == "noise_level" and r["location"] == "noise_buster")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r["_time"],
      value: 1.0, // UtilisÃ© pour le comptage
      noise_level: if r["_value"] >= 80 and r["_value"] <= 85 then "80-85dB"
                   else if r["_value"] > 85 and r["_value"] <= 90 then "85-90dB"
                   else if r["_value"] > 90 and r["_value"] <= 95 then "90-95dB"
                   else if r["_value"] > 95 and r["_value"] <= 100 then "95-100dB"
                   else if r["_value"] > 100 and r["_value"] <= 105 then "100-105dB"
                   else if r["_value"] > 105 and r["_value"] <= 110 then "105-110dB"
                   else if r["_value"] > 110 and r["_value"] <= 115 then "110-115dB"
                   else if r["_value"] > 115 then "115+dB"
                   else "Under 80dB"
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["noise_level"])
  |> count(column: "value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

panels.title: Total illegal noises for selected time range

targets.query:
from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r.location == "noise_buster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "noise_level")
  |> max(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r.location == "noise_buster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "noise_level")
  |> max(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: -1mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events" and r.location == "noise_buster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "noise_level")
  |> max(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "noise_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "noise_buster")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      noise_level: if r._value >= 80 and r._value <= 85 then "80-85dB"
                   else if r._value > 85 and r._value <= 90 then "86-90dB"
                   else if r._value > 90 and r._value <= 95 then "91-95dB"
                   else if r._value > 95 and r._value <= 100 then "96-100dB"
                   else if r._value > 100 and r._value <= 105 then "101-105dB"
                   else if r._value > 105 and r._value <= 110 then "106-110dB"
                   else if r._value > 110 and r._value <= 115 then "111-115dB"
                   else if r._value > 115 then "115+dB"
                   else "Other"
    }))
  |> group(columns: ["noise_level"])
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, noise_level: r.noise_level}))

panels.title: % per infraction / dB level for selected time range

targets.query:
from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: today(), stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "noise_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "noise_buster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 86)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "count_over_80")

panels.title: Amount of noises today (reset daily at midnight)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "noise_buster")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "noise_buster_events")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "noise_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "noise_buster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 86)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "count_over_80")

title: Noise Buster
